In case you're wondering, zunda is, like, sweet mashed green soybeans. And mitarashi is sweet soy sauce glaze. In fact, the dango stands are pretty much the same as in [**those two's article**](https://en.touhouwiki.net/index.php?title=Alternative_Facts_in_Eastern_Utopia/Article_and_Interview/Seiran_and_Ringo) in *AFiEU*.
